Minor Requirements: Minimum 36 credits or 10 courses. Biological Sciences evaluates based on courses completed rather than credits to account for variation in transfer course credits
Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to the minor and prerequisites
Students pursuing the Quantitative Biology Major may not complete a major from Biological Sciences
Minimum 2 courses unique to the minor
Minimum 5 courses completed in residence at UMBC

Complete the following:: BIOL 141 - Foundations of Biology: Cells, Energy and Organisms (4)
BIOL 142 - Foundations of Biology: Ecology and Evolution (4)
MATH 151 - Calculus and Analytic Geometry I (4)
MATH 152 - Calculus and Analytic Geometry II (4)
STAT 350 - Statistics with Applications in the Biological Sciences (4) or STAT 355 - Introduction to Probability and Statistics for Scientists and Engineers (4)

Complete a minimum of 6 credits from the: BIOL 312L - Modeling in the Life Sciences (2)
BIOL 313 - Introduction to Bioinformatics and Computational Biology (3)
BIOL 410 - Modeling in the Life Sciences (4)
BIOL 483 - Evolution: From Genes to Genomes (4)
